books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs, recently shot to death in Texas, discusses his battlefield experiences.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Brandi Glanville with Leslie Bruce
books.description: One of the “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” describes growing up poor, her contentious divorce, her D.U.I. and other adventures.
books.name: DRINKING AND TWEETING

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Ben C. Carson and Candy Carson
books.description: A doctor explores what makes America great.
books.name: AMERICA THE BEAUTIFUL

books.author: by Sonia Sotomayor
books.description: The Supreme Court justice recalls growing up in the Bronx, attending Princeton, working for the Manhattan District Attorney’s office and becoming a federal judge.
books.name: MY BELOVED WORLD

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Amity Shlaes
books.description: The 30th president is reclaimed as a conservative hero in this biography.
books.name: COOLIDGE

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET

books.author: by Terry Francona and Dan Shaughnessy
books.name: FRANCONA

books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden, by a former member of the Navy SEALs.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Mike Piazza with Lonnie Wheeler
books.name: LONG SHOT

books.author: by Lawrence Wright
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author examines the world of Scientology.
books.name: GOING CLEAR

books.author: by Al Gore
books.description: The six drivers of global change that are reshaping our world.
books.name: FUTURE

books.author: by Jenna Miscavige Hill with Lisa Pulitzer
books.description: How the niece of the Scientology leader David Miscavige left the church at 21.
books.name: BEYOND BELIEF
